metadata.title: CVE-2021-47073 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:platform/x86: dell-smbios-wmi: Fix oops on rmmod dell_smbiosinit_dell_smbios_wmi() only registers the dell_smbios_wmi_driver on systemswhere the Dell WMI interface is supported. While exit_dell_smbios_wmi()unregisters it unconditionally, this leads to the following oops: [175.722921] ------------[ cut here ]------------ [ 175.722925] Unexpecteddriver unregister! [ 175.722939] WARNING: CPU: 1 PID: 3630 atdrivers/base/driver.c:194 driver_unregister+0x38/0x40 ... [ 175.723089]Call Trace: [ 175.723094] cleanup_module+0x5/0xedd [dell_smbios] ... [175.723148] ---[ end trace 064c34e1ad49509d ]--- Make the unregister happenon the same condition the register happens to fix this.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47073` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-2.16
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1094-kvm - 4.4.0-1004.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1129-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-2.16').
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-151.157~16.04.1').
linux-kvm package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1004.9').
linux-aws package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1001.10').
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1109.116~16.04.1').
linux-azure package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1121.134~16.04.1').
linux-gcp package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1106.120~16.04.1').
linux-oracle package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1078.86~16.04.1').
